metadata.description: Unique id for the scheduled alert rule

properties.description: Display incidents in which highly sensitive legal information was placed at risk by user sharing.
properties.displayName: Cognni Incidents for Highly Sensitive Legal Information
properties.query:
let highRisk = 3;
let legal = 'Legal Information';
CognniIncidents_CL 
| where Severity == highRisk
| where informationType_s == legal
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(5h)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = userId_s
